projects.title: IPNDNotes
projects.description: Here are some notes I took for Udacity's Introduction to Programming Nanodegree course. Read through and post something nice in the homepage.

projects.title: NeighborhoodMap
projects.description: Here we have a list of cities. Filter them by typing in the box. Click on the marker for additional details about the city.

projects.title: PortfolioProject
projects.description: A template for creating a basic portfolio page. Inspect it and get some creative ideas on how to design your own portfolio page.

projects.title: SimplifAi
projects.description: Empower users to extract more meaning from their information and establish data-driven, realistic expectations for future data points.

projects.title: RandomQuotes
projects.description: Generate random quotes by clicking the New Quote button. If one you like appears, click Tweet to post on your Twitter.

projects.title: WikipediaViewer
projects.description: A fun viewer to search Wikipedia articles. You can even open up a random article.

projects.title: SimonGame
projects.description: Play a childhood favorite: Simon! Begin by pressing start and see if you can beat the game!

projects.title: FriendFinder
projects.description: Remember the locations of your remote friends with this app. Type in a friend name and their city. Upon submit, your friend will be saved onto the map.

projects.title: PicWorthy
projects.description: Share your favorite spots and see what other people are checking out. Discover places you never knew existed, right around the corner.

projects.title: ProjectGallery
projects.description: A page to view my projects. Search projects by title or technology used. Clicking on a project card will take you to its webpage.
